gui.landmgr.landperm.title: Permission Control
gui.landtransfer.title: Territory Transfer
gui.landtag.title: Landtag Nickname
gui.delland.title: Delete Territory
gui.oplandmgr.title: Administration Domain Manager

gui.landmgr.landinfo.content:
Owner: <a>
LandID: <b>
nickname: <c>
 range: §l<e>§r <d> -> < f>
Length/Width/Height: <g>/<h>/<i>
Bottom area: <j> Square grid volume: <k> Cubic grid
gui.landmgr.landperm.basic_options.place: Blocks are allowed to be placed
gui.landmgr.landperm.basic_options.destr: Blocks are allowed to be destroyed
gui.landmgr.landperm.basic_options.ride_: It is allowed to ride in a minecart/boat
gui.landmgr.landperm.funcblock_options.b: Allow the use of blast furnace
gui.landmgr.landperm.funcblock_options.a: The use of anvil is allowed
gui.landmgr.landperm.contblock_options.d: Allow the launcher to be opened
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.campf: Allow the use of campfire barbecue
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.fence: Allow to open and close fence gates
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.noteb: Allows to modify the note block
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.item_: Allow operation of item display frame
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.press: It is allowed to step on the pressure plate
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.fishi: Allow the use of fishing rods
gui.landmgr.landperm.editevent: Control the events that can occur in (near) the territory, please move to the territory setting tab.
gui.fastlmgr.title: Fast LMgr
gui.fastlmgr.content: You are now on §l<a>§r, you can use the following options to quickly manage your territory.
gui.fastlmgr.operator: §lAdministrator mode §rNow you can operate the domain like the domain owner
gui.fastgde.title: Domain Shortcut Menu
gui.fastgde.content:
Welcome to the territory system, you now have §l<a>§r territory.

§lPlease Chose...
gui.oplandmgr.trsland.content: Forced to transfer the generals, all permissions will be transferred.
gui.oplandmgr.unknownland: The owner of this territory could not be found
gui.oplandmgr.tip: This is the administrator's territory manager, you can directly edit the plug-in settings and manage the full-service territory, try it!
gui.oplandmgr.selectoption: Select the operation to be performed
gui.oplandmgr.landcfg.maxland: The player has at most territory
gui.oplandmgr.economy.sbname: Scoreboard name (if the scoreboard economy is selected)
gui.oplandmgr.features.autochkupd: Automatically check for updates (including online announcements)
gui.oplandmgr.features.forcetalk: Force the territory to prompt to use the message form
gui.oplandmgr.features.seltolname: Enclosure tool name (for specific selection tools, please use /land mgr selectool, here is just the configuration name)
gui.oplandmgr.features.maxple: Maximum number of particles per player
gui.oplandmgr.features.autoupdate: Automatically upgrade to the latest version
gui.oplandmgr.features.offlinepls: Allows offline players to transfer territory/add trust
gui.buyland.chosedim: Please select the type of territory you want to create
gui.buyland.unsupport: This server does not currently support <a> Enclosure
gui.buyland.succeed: Successful purchase of the territory! Do you want to open the territory manager now?
gui.delland.content: Are you sure you want to delete your territory? \nIf you are sure, you will get a <a><b> refund. Then your territory will lose its protection and the configuration file will be deleted immediately.
gui.landdescribe.tip:
Territory notes will be sent to other visitors when they come to your territory.

Support variables:
$visitor = visitor name
$n = line break
gui.landtrust.tip: Turn on the switch of the item you want to operate, and submit it after completion.
gui.landtrust.addtrust:
Add trusted players
Trusted players will have all domain permissions, but cannot edit or delete domains.
gui.landtag.tip: The territory nickname helps you distinguish multiple territories without changing the original territory configuration
gui.landtransfer.tip: After the domain transfer is completed, all permissions will be transferred. You are no longer the owner of the domain, but all the configurations of the original domain will not be changed.
gui.landcfg.tip: Operate the territory function switch here
gui.landcfg.inside.explode: Allow an explosion to occur (also effective nearby)
gui.landtp.point: Successfully set the location [<a>] as the teleport point of the territory <b>.
gui.landtp.tip:
The teleport point that will be teleported to the territory. The default teleport point is the starting coordinates of the territory.
Please use /land point to set the territory teleport point.
gui.landtp.safetp: Target teleportation point may cause suffocation and has teleported you up <a> blocks
title.selectrange.failbystep: The operation failed! Please follow the steps to enclose the land!
title.selectrange.failbycdim: Failed to select points! It is forbidden to select points across latitudes!
title.selectrange.spointa: Please hold <a>, destroy the square or use /land a to select the first point.
title.selectrange.spointb: Please hold <a>, destroy the square or use /land b to select the second point.
title.selectrange.bebuy: Please hold <a>, use /land buy or destroy the block again to create an order.
title.selectrange.nople: You have a large enclosure. To avoid server lag, the particle effects have been temporarily disabled.
title.land.nolicense: Please use /land new to request to create a new territory
title.getlicense.alreadyexists: Please do not repeat the request!!
title.getlicense.succeed: A new territory has been requested
title.getlicense.limit: Do you think the local owner? The proletariat cannot have so much land.
title.buyland.ordersaved:
Your domain purchase order has been temporarily saved, you can hold <a> and click the ground again to call out the order
to abandon this purchase, please use "/land giveup"
title.buyland.succeed:
Successful purchase!
Registration is being registered for you...
title.landtransfer.canttoown: It is not allowed to transfer the land to oneself.
title.landtrust.cantaddown: You cannot add yourself to the trust list
title.landtrust.alreadyexists: The player already exists in the trust list
title.oplandmgr.invalidchar: RepairThere are illegal characters in the modified item, and the operation has been interrupted.
title.oplandmgr.setselectool: Please hold the enclosure tool you want to select to destroy the block
title.landmgr.failed: You don't have a territory yet, use "/land new" to start creating one!
title.giveup.failed: There is no enclosure permit to give up
title.createorder.toobig: The enclosing territory is too big, please enclose it again.
title.createorder.toosmall: The enclosing territory is too small, please enclose it again.
title.createorder.toolow: Three-dimensional enclosure, at least four grids in height.
title.createorder.failbystep: Purchase failed! Please follow the steps to enclose the land!
title.createorder.collision: The enclosure range conflicts with <a> (coordinates: <b>). Please make an enclosure again.
title.landlimit.noperm: This is the territory, you have no right to operate
title.landlimit.nearby: The operation is cancelled because it is too close to another person's territory
title.landtp.fail.noland: You need to stand on the territory first
title.landtp.fail.notowner: You are not the owner of this land
talk.features.closed: This feature has been closed by the domain administrator
command.land: Main Command of the Territory System
command.land_mgr: Open the OP Land console interface
command.land_mgr.noperm: §eThis command is exclusive to the domain administrator, please use §l/land op <a>§r§e to add yourself as a domain administrator in the console.
console.update.newversion: Get the new version <a>, you can use /land update to update automatically!
console.update.force: Sorry, due to cloud settings, your iLand must be updated <a> before it can be used. Forced updates are mostly enabled when there are serious problems with the old version.
console.update.auto: Because you have turned on automatic update, you are starting to update your iLand to a new version...
console.update.restart: After the update is complete, the server needs to be restarted to take effect.
console.autoupdate.alreadylatest: Update stopped because it is already the latest version (<a>).
console.autoupdate.errorbydown: Failed to download file <a>, error code: <b>. Please check your network or report the problem, the update has been interrupted.
console.autoupdate.errorbysha1: The SHA1 verification of the file <a> failed. Please check your network or report a problem. The update has been interrupted.
console.autoupdate.success: Automatic update has been completed, restart the server to take effect.
console.getonline.failbycode: Failed to obtain network information, error code: <a>.
console.getonline.failbyver: The online information file version (<a>) that cannot be parsed. Your iLand may be out of date.
console.error.money.protocol: Unknown economic component'<a>' is being used.
